title: (2450-264) Nazaré - 51 Rua Sub-Vila
description: Laundry service Rio de Longe

title: (2450-082) Nazaré -
description: Nazaré Volunteer Fire Brigade car park. The fire department benefits from the fees. Payment to the guard at the entrance, overnight stays allowed, but right on the main road. About 5 minutes walk to the beach.

title: (2450-111) Nazaré - 34 Avenida Vieira Guimarães
description: Self-service laundry

title: (2450-163) Nazaré - 159 Rua Adrião Batalha
description: Free parking spaces 3min from the beach. Sloping and fairly narrow passages.

title: (2450-162) Nazaré - 11 Rua Doutor Ruy Rosa
description: Lavabdaria da Praia Laundromat

title: (2450-222) Nazaré - 12 Praça Doutor Manuel Arriaga
description: Public toilets just off the beach

title: (2450) Nazaré - En 242
description: Parking just above the area now prohibited for motorhomes. 10 spaces accessible to the large motorhome (a bus next to us). Large Nazare beach and town center 10 mins walk. We spent the day there. I don't know if we spent the night there. It's by the road, it might be a bit noisy for the night.

title: (2450-106) Nazaré - 100 Avenida Manuel Remígio
description: Small water point 50 cm from the ground next to the fish dryers, it is difficult to find water in the area!

title: (2450-060) Nazaré - 1 Largo da Fonte
description: Drinkable water

title: (2450-170) Nazaré -
description: Lavandaria Self-Service H2O. You can wash and dry your clothes here.  Cash to coin change available. Free WiFi, but I didn’t try it. It is possible to park near the building as it is not so busy area.

title: (2450-172) Nazaré - Rua dos Galeões
description: Gravel parking near the beach and the center of Nazaré. flat and with lots of space. Very busy from midday. Calmer again in the evening after bathing time.

title: (2450-065) Nazaré - 124 Rua 25 de Abril
description: A place where you can tap drinking water. Is at least not signposted that it is not drinkable.

title: (2450-065) Nazaré - 5 Rua Maritony
description: Place to stay overnight and park. Without services.

title: (2450-065) Nazaré - 13 Rua dos Tanques
description: Inexpensive laundry. clean and with free wifi

title: (2450-065) Nazaré - 18 Largo da Fonte Velha
description: Places for 3 or 4 vans on the edge of the street, no services except public toilets in the small square 2 minutes. Very quiet place to spend the night.

title: (2450-065) Nazaré - 1 Rua Dom Fuas Roupinho
description: Parking gratuit proche du centre ville 5 min à pied.

title: (2450) Nazaré - N242
description: We parked wonderfully during the day, otherwise it is very difficult. Walking distance to the beach and Sitio possible. We have a 6m camper truck here too.

name: Camping Orbitur Valado
title: (2450) Camping Orbitur Valado
description: Camping Valado, Orbitur group, 2 km from the center of Nazaré, but with a bus that stops on demand in front of the campsite. Well equipped, under the pines, calm.

title: (2450-284) Nazaré - Nº8 Rua Maria Carvalho
description: Possibility to use only the hot shower inside the pool. Hot shower. Pool access

title: (2450-287) Nazaré - 3 Rua Belém do Pará
description: Opposite the 4 places offered by Lidl, the Continente store did the same thing: 3 beautiful, brand new large places and a little quieter than the one opposite (you can still hear the road). No services but free and authorized in a city that does not want us, it's not bad! Magnificent view of the city from the watchtower and its pretty walk less than 20 minutes on foot (1.7 km)

title: (2450-287) Nazaré -
description: Washy Laundromat Inside Continente Modelo Nazaré, very new machines great wash!

title: (2450-287) Nazaré - 15 Rua da Cooperativa
description: The Lidl car park has four large spaces reserved for motorhomes. You can make the purchase, rest and sleep if you want. No emptying or water filling services.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Estr. Areeiro
description: Not nice but ok for one night. It is a large parking lot of an adventure park and therefore only possible to park here in winter. The place is relatively flat. There is no view, you can hear the sound of the sea. Water tap is located next to the driveway by the fence.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Atlântica
description: Picnic area. No watertap anymore. This one is disconnected.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: Hidden gem with a nice view. Multiple other vans parked here. Space to see the sunset. Police drove by in the morning without contacting any of the vans. Toilets are closed at night but open in the morning around 9-10am

title: (2450) Nazaré - 9 En 242
description: Magnificent location facing the ocean. flat place. We entered through the port where we paid €170 for the right of access. This location is easily accessible for a large CC, plus the dirt road is hilly.

title: (2450) Nazaré - 2450 Rua Padre Acrisio
description: Great tarred parking lot for campers. The place is flat and relatively quiet at the end of August. The site is located next to the Norpark leisure and adventure pool and in front of the surfing center. Officially only has 5 designated spaces but here the entire space is mostly unoccupied.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of the forest, sandy path so recommended to Vans with 4 wheel drive. Really quiet, calm, among the pines. Not suitable for motorhome.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Atlântica
description: Beachside area surrounded by nature, views of the sea and the mountains. Sandy lane a bit dirty, but very quiet.

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: Small pine forest away from the road or any urban area. It is accessed after about 300 meters of sand, 4x4 traction recommended. The area is very calm and quiet. Five minutes from Nazare

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: Access by a sand track only in 4x4 but the spot is worth the detour.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: Payment to pass the port, very close to the beach, no amenities, passable dirt road.

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: In the heart of the forest, in a quiet area, a small clearing allowing you to enjoy the shy October sun. sand track to access it. Only 4x4.

name: Olhai Nazaré Outdoor resort
title: () Olhai Nazaré Outdoor resort
description: Ohai Nazaré Outdoor Resort - N 242 - 2km away from Nazaré - Perfect Spot to relax a few days and enjoy the sea food of this beautiful region

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: Pitch in a pine forest at the edge of a small road. We cleaned up the place a bit when we arrived. The regulars of the Gironde beaches will not be too out of place? Ideal for the night.

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: Many places all along the way at the foot of the wind turbines. Easy access path. Not bothered by the sound of wind turbines covered by the sound of the waves. Very good fallback solution when the spot above the ocean is saturated. Note some waste all the same. For a quiet night close to Nazaré, it does the job perfectly.

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: Pine forest. Road with sand but passable with van. We spent the night. Pleasant place, quiet and sheltered from the wind.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: Nice flat place under the pines, close to a wind turbine. For a single car, van, or motorhome. It’s a good alternative to the place under the wind turbine, as this one has more privacy and more shadows. A bit of noise from the wind turbine but nothing too noisy. If this spot is taken you cam always go under the wind turbine just across the road.

title: (2450) Casal Mota - 2 R. do Cossi
description: Water spring

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: A good alternative to the parking space in the immediate vicinity. Here you are somewhat sheltered and set back from the road. Access goes through a small forest path, for motorhomes but no problem.

title: (2450-359) Valado dos Frades - 268 Rua Professor Arlindo Varela
title_short: (2450-359) Valado dos Frades - 268 Rua Professor Arlindo Varela
description: Drinkable water just outside nazare looks like a new tap

title: (2450) Valado dos Frades -
description: Isolated in a pine forest, there is a small lake with tables, garbage cans and barbecue. The spot is located on the edge of a forest road with no traffic at night

title: (2450) Valado dos Frades -
description: Nice place in the middle of the forest by a lake. Fire pits, picnic tables and trash cans available. Very idyllic! Please leave clean!

title: (2450-384) Valado dos Frades - 8 Rua Professor Arlindo Varela
title_short: (2450-384) Valado dos Frades - 8 Rua Professor Arlindo Varela
description: We stopped to prepare food before reaching Nazaré. It has tables and a point to wash old but comfortable to wash. There is also a bar, although the owner is a bit dry and / or rough. It is close to the highway exit so it takes you 100 meters to get to Nazaré

title: () Pataias -
description: Great place to wash and vacuum your camper/motorhome yourself. Everything very well maintained and super cheap.

title: (2445) Pataias - En 242
description: Truck stop next to gas station, restaurant/snack bar, next to woods for sap production, if you want to stretch legs

title_short: (2445) Pataias - 21 Rua Nossa Senhora da Vitória
description: Fountain with water, it is not indicated that it is "non-potable"

title: (2445) Pataias - Rua da Praia
description: Lovely spot, very sloping, quite a few spaces but can be leveled with rocks, perhaps not suitable for large motorhomes. Be respectful of fishermen

title: (2445-280) Pataias -
description: Very quiet place on the top of the beach. Sandy but compact terrain if you are traveling slow you will have no problems keep it clean that is Wild l spot and must stay. Slept one night plus half a day without any disturbances. When there is too much wind it is better to avoid it

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Unnamed Road
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Unnamed Road
description:
Incredible view of the beach, a little spot next to the road just above the village. great sunset, very calm.
the terrain is a bit difficult and not very even, so make sure to drive slowly. 
no problem spending the night here.

title: (2450-027) São Martinho do Porto - 9 Rua do Turista
title_short: (2450-027) São Martinho do Porto - 9 Rua do Turista
description: A water fountain tap to top up water, not sure if safe for drinking but good for cleaning water.

title: (2450-027) Salgado - 1 Rua do Turista
description: Very nice place van. Safe, restaurant opposite the beach too. Really great. Beautiful beach at 40 M! Paid parking, day night, for motorhomes from 11 a.m. to 8 p.m. or from 8 p.m. to 11 a.m. (the following day). Stable and flat solid ground. Right at the entrance to the beach. Note that free parking outside this car park is extremely limited in number of spaces. Huge beach but dangerous swimming because of the rather imposing waves. Restaurant/bar on the edge of the car park.

title: (2450-027) Salgado - 1 Rua do Turista
description: Very nice place, near the ocean, the only thing to pay attention to the dirt road on the left, if you don't have a 4x4 vehicle it could be difficult to go

title: (2450) Nazaré - IC1
description: Water point near exit to services.

description: Spot nature facing the village of Nazaré. In board so windy side.

title: (2450-027) Famalicão - Unnamed Road

Nice pic-nic area with barbecue, minimalist - no wc - no water--no electricity. Great sky view, no noise apart of the wind. 
 I live around, please leave the place as you would love to find it

Freshly opened campsite in May 2023 after renovation.

Very nice location, 15 mins walk to the beach and well equipped with swimming pool, basketball court, playground, etc.

title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua Doutor Eduíno Borges Garcia
description: Parking next to the Alcobaça market, and very close to the historic center. It has no services. You can sleep well at night, there are shadows, and even some green space. The tourist post indicated that we could spend the night here. Saturday morning there is market next door, prepare to wake up at night while riding it ..

title: () Alcobaça -

title: () Coz - 8 Rua Santa Rita
description: Lovely tranquil place. Silent night. Attractive little village. Church bells strike every hour but quiet and low so we weren't disturbed. Highly recommended. Loved it.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 30 Rua Doutor Francisco Zagalo

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Praia da Gralha
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Praia da Gralha
description: Access by road (4x4 not necessary but VERY steep). When I arrived there were 4 campers: 2 occupying the sand of the same beach and 2 very bulky campers, occupying the place of 4 cars. I think it would be more respectful not to park on the beach (do it in the parking lot that is 6 meters higher) and park optimizing the parking space, even if you don't have the same views from the kitchen of your camper. Avoid camping with tables, awnings...etc.

title: (2445) Pataias - 1 Rua Currais Velhos

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 13 Rua Fortunato de Magalhães

title: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua de Leiria

title: (2460) Camping Silveira

description: Great sand trail with lots of areas to camp beautiful views only accessible by 4x4 or a van if you get stuck lower tire pressure

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - Unnamed Road
description: Accessible place except camping car but 4 * 4 or car is good! Ocean view breathtaking. The floor is however not flat everywhere but it is possible to find a corner where to settle for the night. It is very quiet. Before going on the unpaved road that leads to this place there is a parking with a shower, which can be useful.

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Avenida Marginal
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Avenida Marginal
description: Parking allowed day and night. You can hardly park anywhere anymore, but here is a sign for the end of the RV parking ban. We have slept one night and without problem. Room for about 20.

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - Unnamed Road
description: Spot with incredible ocean view. Magnificent sunset. On the left of the track, uneven access (holes) but we got there without problems in a 2x4 car. No convenience, nothing but nature and you. Truly sublime!

title: (2500-685) Salir do Porto - 50 Rua Dom Fernando
title_short: (2500-685) Salir do Porto - 50 Rua Dom Fernando

description:

tables available. no black water drain available.

title_short: (2500) Salir do Porto - 42 Rua Professor Montenegro

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - Unnamed Road
description: Spot accessible by 4x4 with high cell. Magnificent view of the ocean and wild nature. Departure from the paths and trails for walking and / or mountain biking to discover the mouth of the splendid Bay of Sao Martinho do Porto and its Chapel renovated in 2020.

title: (2445) Pataias - São Pedro de Moel - Pataias

title: (2445) Pataias - 14 Rua do Segrel
description:
Awesome spot with straight sea views left and right. Also great surf.
Toilets locked at night when the bar closes. Access to the glorious beach via stairs. impressive lava formation nearby.

title: (2445) Pataias - 18 Rua do Jogral
description: Small parking lot with stunning views of the beach and the ocean. Quiet at the end of the day and in the evening.

title: (2445) Pataias - 2445 Acesso Água de Madeiros
description: Parking in an unfinished subdivision, between village and beach. Possibility of day and night. Quiet without service.

title: (2460-615) Moleanos - Estrada Nacional 1, km 95
description: Clearance area, open from Monday to Saturday, from 9:30 am to 7:30 pm. Along with a store of accessories, liquids, Repsol gas. Store closed for lunch 1pm to 2.30pm. You can use tables and benches for picnics.  It is located on ESTRADA NACIONAL 1 - Km 95 - MOLEANOS.  Be sure to visit the motorhome utilities store on site.

title: (2430) Marinha Grande -
description: Quiet place with a magnificent view of the beach and sea. Beach access very close by.

title: (2405-009) Maceira - 2A Travessa da Shell
description: Shaded spot appropriate for overnight stay. Auto electrician across the road who will bring cars in and out of a morning and afternoon. Car park empties in afternoon. Next door to Service station and farms. Road is quiet of a nighttime.

title: (2480) Dinez - 47-51 Rua do Barreiro
description: I went there on the recommendation of another GPL gas station because I hadn't taken a tank adapter for my LPG tank bottle with me and I needed the right adapter for Portugal and Spain. All adapters were available there and even normal German gas bottles could be helped. In addition, the LPG price was also very cheap. So it was worth filling up there right away. Easy to reach from the IC-2, only the entrance to the gas station was a bit narrow. Turning with my 7.40 long camper was possible.

title: (2460) - IC2
description: Park for trucks, 24 hours dinner and serviço, with showers. in the gás station

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road
description: Access is made from São Pedro beach (to avoid sandy road). This is a magical corner with ocean view to both south and north. Easy access to an almost private beach. The road is a bit sandy a bit rocky, but I think it’s accessible to almost any camper at the moment. Do not try to reach it from south because the road is more sandy. There’s a beach nearby called São Pedro with supermarkets and restaurants.

title: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - N8
description: Water tap and picnic table.

title_short: (2430-494) Marinha Grande - 8 Avenida José Nobre Marques
description: Above the sea, showers on the beach, indoor showers at the toilets which are under the promenade towards the center, closed at 6 p.m. we broke down for 3 days in this car park. showers on the beach, WC a little further.

title: (2500) - Atlântica
description: Picnic area with tables and benches, water point, point of view on sea and cliff. We stayed there, very little passing after sunset.

description: Parking with beach view. No facilities.

title: (2430-517) Marinha Grande - Rua Antigas Serrações
description: Parking by the beach quiet place, tiny and beautiful town, just 100m there are showers and bathrooms belonging to the beach (free that if the cold water), there is also a chiringito where we have breakfast super cheap, in summer season we assume that this full is another one a little higher on the right. It is already the second time we come to this town and I am sure we will return

title: (2430-492) Marinha Grande - 17 Praça Afonso Lopes Vieira
title_short: (2430-492) Marinha Grande - 17 Praça Afonso Lopes Vieira
description: Public tap on a small square above the beach. Good for filling bottles and cans, no possibility to connect a tap or hose. There is a public shower on the beach.

title: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - 8 Estrada Nacional 8
description:
A parking lot in front of the Igreja de Nossa Senhora da Anunciação de Tornada.
Excellent location, despite being next to N8.
Very close to Paul da Tornada, a nature reserve.
I recommend a visit.
In the roundabouts there are cafes, bars and restaurants.

name: Casa Féteira
title: (2480-113) Casa Féteira
description:
Welcome you to our olive oil farm!

You can park your camping-car/van in our olive groove everyday of the week.

You can also ask for a guided tour of our olive mill in Portuguese, English or French, and understand how we make one of the bests olive oils of this region. From Mondays to Saturdays, between 9am and 6pm. 

You may want to order our homemade Portuguese meal and/or breakfast . 

You'll find our olive oil and other olive oil products on our shop and you'll be able to take home a piece of our portuguese culture!

We will be very happy to have you!

name: Camping Orbitur
title: (2430-492) Camping Orbitur
description: Camping Orbitur, nice, big enough, swimming pool with slide, restaurant, grocery store, and the fishmonger spends the morning. We can stay until 17h.

address.street: Marinha Grande - São Pedro de Moel

title: (2500) Boavista -
description: Viewpoint accessible via a dirt road. Ok For panel vans and smaller vehicles. limited width. View of the Atlantic, very quiet.

title: (2480) Calvaria de Cima - 11 Largo da Igreja
title_short: (2480) Calvaria de Cima - 11 Largo da Igreja
description: Water as if it was raining? (well almost) nice to fill the water bottle

name: Parque Campismo S. Pedro Moel, Grupo Campigir
title: (2430) Parque Campismo S. Pedro Moel, Grupo Campigir
title_short: (2430) Parque Campismo S. Pedro Moel, Grupo Campigir
description: Parque de Campismo Sao Pedro de Moel, large campsite, lots of space, beautiful surroundings. Very basic sanitary facilities in dire need of updating. Showers are outdated but hot. The dishwater is cold. Some of the campsite is already being modernized. There is now an area for gray water disposal and fresh water. The pitches are flat and on firm but sandy ground. There are also shaded pitches in some places. Seat selection is free. Electricity on the pitch is included (note: sockets only for type F plugs, adapter for CEE required!). Magnificent view of the sea across from the campsite, near a lighthouse with great cliffs (5min walk), nice bathing beach 15min walk away.

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Praia da Vieira - São Pedro de Moel
title_short: (2430) Marinha Grande - Praia da Vieira - São Pedro de Moel
description: Stayed here for a couple of nights lovely beach but no facility

address.street: Praia da Vieira - São Pedro de Moel

title: () Caldas da Rainha - 77 Estrada Nacional 8
description: LPG gas. Very very cheap! And a lovely owner. It’s at the back of the warehouses so don’t be put off!

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road
description: I've spent the night there and it was fantastic! You can sleep while hearing the water and nature. There are tables and trash bins all over. If you go there I suggest parking the car and going on foot near the road, because there are a lot of places to choose, then go get the car to your preferred spot.

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road
description: Many picnic areas hidden in the forest. For us, very quiet at this time, we even slept there. Beware, however, of certain paths where there is a lot of sand.

title: (2430-307) Marinha Grande - Lote 8, 2430-309 Rua das Portas Verdes
title_short: (2430-307) Marinha Grande - Lote 8, 2430-309 Rua das Portas Verdes
description: Launderette new and clean. Large parking lot in front of it.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 26 Rua Serra dos Candeiros
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 26 Rua Serra dos Candeiros
description: Acesso através de terra Batida mas transitável, ótima vista e muito sossegado, tem 6 mesas pic nic e 2 barbecues.Sem água nem Wc.

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Rua da Portela
description: Parking in the middle of the pine forest. Many picnic tables and a water point. Very quiet and beautiful.

name: Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
title: (2480) Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
description: It is a place at the start of the Ecopista walk. There is a playground and a football field. It is outdated on the one hand, but the facilities for motorhomes seem very new. There are toilets but they are closed. There is also a place to bbq, but no idea if that can be used. Water works. Everything for free.

title: (2430-241) Marinha Grande - 2 Rua Bernardino José Gomes
title_short: (2430-241) Marinha Grande - 2 Rua Bernardino José Gomes
description: Quiet parking Next to Fire Station, Museum of Glass and Municipal Archive. Near Municipal Chamber. Without services. Intermarche at 900 meters. We have spent a quiet night

title: (2480) - 13 Rua da Lagoa Grande
description: To spend a quiet night in the natural park, by a lake. There are very clean public toilets, tables, a barbecue, water.

title: (2430-123) Marinha Grande - 66 Rua dos Poços
description: Herdade das Toupeiras offers this space where you can spend the night and day with your motorhome in total peace and rest. From here you can take the opportunity to get to know the city of Marinha Grande, which is the land of glass, as we are located less than 1 km from the city center. Namely, you can visit the Glass Museum and also the Joaquim Correia Museum, where you can also enjoy the beautiful gardens that exist in this city. Herdade das Toupeiras is also located about 10 km from the coast where we have several fantastic beaches to discover. At 100m from the Herdade there is a cafe and a laundry and we also have a bakery at about 300m and the supermarket is also close at about 700m. At Herdade das Toupeiras we have 12 places available, however the resources for motorhomes are still scarce and archaic, as the Herdade is not intended for profit. Soon it is expected to create an area for dumping and water supply. Donations are welcome for the proper maintenance and improvement of the space. As a campervan that I am, you can always count on me for anything! The Estate is open 24 hours but it is convenient to call to notify your arrival

title: () Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road
description: Parking with sea view, nice restaurant on the first day of opening. Out of season it must be possible to sleep.

title: (2475-126) Benedita - 23 Rua 16 de Maio
description: Only vehicles up to 3500kg.  Free parking spaces on a tree-lined road.  Adjacent to a beautiful children's playground, small square, garden with benches.  On the other side of the gas station self-service washing machines with free wifi.  At 5 minutes walking distance from the center.

title: (2500) - Atlântica
description: Small place for one van by the sea with nice views and great sunsets. The access is a little tricky and is not recomended for anything bigger than a small camper, 4x4 would be better and If you do not have one do not go further down to the last platform as there is a large rock that will be difficult to get back over. No services just peace, when the wind is not to strong.

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - 29 Rua Vieira de Leiria
title_short: (2430) Marinha Grande - 29 Rua Vieira de Leiria
description: Free parking lot in the city center. Close to Glass museums, library, glassblowing workshops, cinema, local church, bars and restaurants. Small grocery stores and 3 minute walk to a big Intermarche store.

title: () - Rua do Barreiro
description: Nature, panorama and tranquility! Corner to explore! Other places surely as nice as this one, chosen at random when leaving the summit route. Worth a visit for the villages with countless small stone walls characteristic of the place. In the heights of the natural park with magnificent views of the plains and surely on the Nazaré Sea (for us covered by a cloud bank in the distance). The site is at the entrance to one of the park's hikes, and has a pretty stone vestige and two uninhabited houses (one of which is open to the winds) in the middle of the pines. Not a cat in the middle of August, seems very little frequented (the foot!). Windy, very pleasant in hot weather, a little less on an evening of bad weather.

title: () Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road
description: Hard sand beach parking lot. Ocean view. Do not come in the middle of the day in high season because you run the risk of finding the parking lot full and the small access road can be difficult to pass with a motorhome if there are cars on the sides.

title: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - 76 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - 76 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
description: To wash the motorhome a ramp

title: (2475-150) Benedita - 207 Rua da Fábrica da Sola
title_short: (2475-150) Benedita - 207 Rua da Fábrica da Sola
description: Flat parking, in the parking lot of the municipal swimming pool. Calm at night. On Saturday evening some young people, but without problem.

title: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - 32 Rua da Palhagueira
title_short: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - 32 Rua da Palhagueira
description: Car wash, at the end there is a place for high vehicles, perfect for camper vans!

title: (2430-275) Marinha Grande - 174 Avenida José Gregório
description: Intermarche. fresh water available. no grey/black dumping.

title: (2480-303) Porto de Mós - Rua do Rio Alcaide
title_short: (2480-303) Porto de Mós - Rua do Rio Alcaide
description: Washing machines at the Intermarche parking lot

title: (2500) - Atlântica
description: Panorama on the coast, wild place, easily accessible by a dirt track. Very quiet place, perfect for the night. You can walk down to the sea, but no easy access to water (only rocks)

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480
description: Large pitches with water and possibility of draining gray and black water. Leisure park with picnic tables, miniature golf, ice rink and beautiful and spacious children's play areas. Next to a busy road during the day. There is clean spring water across the street. The facilities here are very good. With abuse, no electricity.

address.street: Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho -
description: At the end of a small path, a small place to land and turn around, even with a large motorhome. Access to a small deserted beach. By walking 5 minutes. Magnificent sunset.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
description:
Free public toilets and showers including changing table. Very clean. Open from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. Bad parking. It is best to use the parking lot on the opposite side of the park.
Not open on WEEKENDS!

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 3 Rua Professor José Lalanda Ribeiro
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 3 Rua Professor José Lalanda Ribeiro
description: Good place to stay overnight

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 23 Rua da Crocha
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 23 Rua da Crocha
description: A very quiet, flat and safe place to spend the night, located between an urbanization, a residence for the elderly and some orchards. It is formed as a sheltered square with a reedbed that is ideal

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 2 Rua Pereira Brazão
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 2 Rua Pereira Brazão
description: Continent Parking. I have spent one night here with no problems.

title: (2500-481) Foz do Arelho -
description: Very easy to access, sea view, sandy beach within walking distance. 3 days for us in peace. A few walkers and fishermen. Please keep the place clean

title: (2440) Batalha - 1 Estrada da Saudade
description: Parking area not tested but discovered during our search for the night, we went elsewhere. circular track with flat and hard parking spaces. parking against the cemetery. the place looks peaceful and it is close to the monastery. Good troubleshooting in case of late arrival. To test !

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
description: Park next to Santa Casa da Misericórdia. Quieter than ASA, because ASA is next to the road. Parking and overnight stay allowed, except on fair days.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Atlântica
description: Landing at the end of a path, for 4x4 or van only, too complicated for camper. 1 see 2 places tight. Tranquility assured and a breathtaking view with sunset. Superb !!

title: (2500-500) Foz do Arelho - 42 N360
description: Laundry self service. Some shops nearby.

name: Parque de Campismo Orbitur Foz de Arelho.
title: (2500) Parque de Campismo Orbitur Foz de Arelho.
title_short: (2500) Parque de Campismo Orbitur Foz de Arelho.
description: Camping site near the Lagoon. 3 min by car. with pool and bar. Lovely camping Place for tents. Electricity 4 euro. 2 adults and 1 car around 23 euro

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 32 Rua 31 de Janeiro
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 32 Rua 31 de Janeiro
description: Near police station and services. Very quite.

title: (2440) Batalha - 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio
title_short: (2440) Batalha - 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio
description: Let's pass a quiet night. We were two non-local parked motorhomes. A GNR passou, I fell with two motorhomes in no trouble. Passaram some times to go round, allowing pernoita. You have free Wi-Fi access.

address.street: 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio

title: (2440-038) Batalha - 14 Rua António Cândido da Encarnação
title_short: (2440-038) Batalha - 14 Rua António Cândido da Encarnação
description: Laundry. Self service 8h - 22h everyday.

title: (2440) Batalha - Rua Nossa Senhora do Caminho
title_short: (2440) Batalha - Rua Nossa Senhora do Caminho
description: This site is the waste and water service area only, not overnight parking. There’s a charge for fresh water. The overnight parking area with electricity is close by, 100 metres away. 200 metres from the monastery, restaurants and cafes.

title: (2440) Batalha - 2 Rua das Piscinas
description: Electricity, 4 outlets available. For water, go to the other service area 200m further.

title: (2500-852) Caldas da Rainha - 1A Avenida Adelino Mamede de Oliveira
title_short: (2500-852) Caldas da Rainha - 1A Avenida Adelino Mamede de Oliveira
description: Nice place to wash clothes and near places to eat and drink a coffee.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: This is a nice place to have a lunch. And see the Ribatejo

title: (2440) Batalha - Rue de Dom Douarte
description: This is the official 24-hour free RV park, approximately 200m from the Cathedral. Right next to the good pizzeria Old Jack. Closed on Mondays from 7 a.m. to 2 p.m. due to the market. VE 100m across the street.

title: (2440) Batalha - 2 Rua do Moinho da Vila
title_short: (2440) Batalha - 2 Rua do Moinho da Vila
description: Shaded parking two steps from the sites classified very well for a stopover visits or for a nap at the end of afternoon

title: (2440) Batalha - 10 Rua do Infante Dom Fernando
title_short: (2440) Batalha - 10 Rua do Infante Dom Fernando
description: Free parking ideal for the day to visit the monastery which is a 5 minute walk but no places in the shade. Children's playground nearby. Not tested at night.

title: (2440) Batalha - 19 Praceta Infante Dom Pedro
description: Laundromat

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 226 N243
description: Location at the edge of the road ideal for two camper because if no cars on top beautiful view, however noisy in the morning with cars that roll at high speed but repairs very well for one night.

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 22 Rua Carlos Neves
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 22 Rua Carlos Neves
description: Very quiet school parking lot at night. Come only on weekends, because during the week there are school buses that park.

title: (2440) Batalha - 330 Avenida dos Descobrimentos
description: Nice straight parking lot in a very nice city park not far from the monastery. but with WiFi, basketball, toilets and free mini golf, if you have your putter with you.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 45 Rua Joaquim Frutuoso
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 45 Rua Joaquim Frutuoso
description: The parking lot is on a quiet street with little traffic. No prohibition signs and little traffic noise made for a relaxing night!

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 6B Rua Visconde Morais
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 6B Rua Visconde Morais
description: Very nice parking lot. Quiet environment overlooking the Atlantic. Could stay there without problems. Access very easy, because right next to a very busy street.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 43 Rua Francisco Almeida Grandela
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 43 Rua Francisco Almeida Grandela
description: Parking for the night next to the football stadium, and the children's playground. Quiet at night.

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 21 N360
description: Baleia verde - very nice car wash

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 20 Rua de Vitorino Frois
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 20 Rua de Vitorino Frois
description: Convenient parking to see the city. Night possible but not charming. We continue for the night. No service

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 28 Rua José Francisco de Sousa
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 28 Rua José Francisco de Sousa
description: Mini euro station with two places, gray and black water, emptying free of charge, drinking water for a token, a screw thread fits on the fresh water/drinking water tap. With a sufficiently long hose, filling works without any problems.

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 13 Rua Cidade de Abrantes
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 13 Rua Cidade de Abrantes
description: Self service laundry.

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - Praça da Universidade
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - Praça da Universidade
description: Parking big enough next to a hotel school. Super quiet out of season, there are trucks that sleep there too.

title: (2500-934) Caldas da Rainha - 2500 Avenida Barata Feyo
title_short: (2500-934) Caldas da Rainha - 2500 Avenida Barata Feyo
description: Laundry, gas station, Burger Kong, E. Leclerc supermarket

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 20 Rua José Carlos Santos
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 20 Rua José Carlos Santos
description: A few free parking spaces at the roadside, with a lot of incline. For a city visit but absolutely great - just walk through the park into the city. Not recommended overnight.

title: (2500-483) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Monte do Facho
title_short: (2500-483) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Monte do Facho
description: Dead end street. we can put a motorhome 6m.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Encosta do Reivas
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Encosta do Reivas
description: Hardly parking, without services. quiet day and night
